meanings.definition: Unnilhexium: a synthetic element with the atomic number 106.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study unnilhexium to learn more about synthetic elements.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes unnilhexium as element 106.
meanings.sent3: When unnilhexium met helium at the lab, they formed an unexpected bond.
meanings.sent4: The discovery of unnilhexium was like finding a hidden treasure in the world of chemistry.
meanings.sent5: In the lab, the glow of unnilhexium illuminated the excitement of scientific progress.

meanings.definition: Unnilhexium: the chemical element with the symbol Sg and atomic number 106.
meanings.sent1: Chemists use unnilhexium in experiments to explore its properties.
meanings.sent2: The symbol Sg represents unnilhexium in the periodic table.
meanings.sent3: During the experiment, unnilhexium and oxygen engaged in a colorful reaction.
meanings.sent4: The presence of unnilhexium in the compound added a mysterious allure.
meanings.sent5: The unique characteristics of unnilhexium make it stand out among other elements.
